summary: This is an email forwarding a link to a New York Daily News article titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's final days at NYC jail revealed by inmates'. The article appears to detail revelations from inmates about Epstein's time in jail leading up to his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded news article, which details his final days in a New York City jail before his death.

events.title: Publication of article on Epstein's final days
events.description: The New York Daily News publishes an article revealing details about Jeffrey Epstein's final days at a New York City jail, as told by inmates.

keyFacts: A news article titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's final days at NYC jail revealed by inmates' was published on December 28, 2020.
The article was published by the New York Daily News.
The document is an email forwarding a link to this article, indicating the information was being shared among parties interested in the case.
